article_title: Colleges go pass/fail to address coronavirus
article_description: In many ways  the new coronavirus has wreaked havoc on the lives of college students  faculty and staff members  Many institutions have moved classes online and encouraged students to leave campus  creating a flurry of confusion  uncertainty and anxiety  More
